1274:2789: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre-śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti|
1274:2792: tadyathā dahano'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate|
1274:2793: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate|
1274:2799: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ

1274:2802: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate|

1274:2951: kiñcāha- nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ|
1274:2969: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha-vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti|
1274:2972: kiñcāha-pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti|

1274:3142: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti|
1274:3143: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi|

1274:3167: loke ca nāsti ko'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ|
1274:3169: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti|

1274:3191: yadyapi bhavānāha-agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti|

1274:3202: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati|
1274:3205: caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati|

1274:3214: ato bhavatā pūrvamuktam-tīrthikāḥ pañcaskandhān vihāya pṛthagātmā'stīti manyante|
1274:3220: jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti|
